name: Structural Engineers
description:
Usually job responsibilities vary greatly according to the size and type of the position, but typically it includes:

  • Gauging project’s requirements & constraints ( especially in terms of cost and time )
  • Supervising construction when needed.
  • Communicating with clients/consultants and suppliers.
  • Designing and implementing cost-effective equipment modifications to help improve safety, reliability and throughput
  • Writing reports and documentations to the owner revealing progress of work.
  • Analyzing and interpreting data handed to modify when possible.
  • Executing necessary shop drawings when requested

name: Architecture
description:
At Yamen, each of the following departments has its own contributions to enhance the running of the business:

  1. Finance
  2. Accounting
  3. Marketing & Sales

Finance

  • Keeping records of the purchases and sales made by a business as well as capital spending.
  • Preparing Final Accounts as Profit and loss account and Balance Sheets
  • Providing management information to enable managers make better decisions.
  • Calculating the wages and salaries of employees and organizing the collection of income tax and national insurance for the Inland Revenue.
  • Raising Finance through loans, and the repayment of interest on that finance. In addition it will supervise the payment of dividends to shareholders.

Accounting

Typically, the accounting department is responsible for the following:

  • Payrolls
  • Cash Payments
  • Cash Collection
  • Procurement and Inventory

Marketing & Sales

  • Sales department is held laible for the selling and distribution of the products to variousregions
  • Research & Department is responsible for conducting continual marketing researches and testings new products to ensure continual evelovement and on going supreme quality level in manufacturing products
  • Promotion department decides on the type of promotion method for the products, arranges advertisements and the advertising media used.

name: Geotechnical Engineer
description:
At Yamen, this post will prepare you for an exciting and creative profession that includes decision making, handling responsibilities, and boosting your abilities to the highest extent. It includes:

  • Drawing up plans using computer-assisted engineering and design software
  • Help in estimating material, construction, and labor costs, and project timescales
  • Coordinating technicians and craftspeople
  • Testing installations and systems while analyzing data
  • Making sure projects meet electrical and construction safety regulations
  • Overseeing inspection and maintenance programs
  • Submitting daily reports to the owner
  • Attending meetings, writing reports and giving presentations to managers and clients.

name: Mechanical Engineers
description:
Architects at Yamen are expected to design structures and focus on cost, safety, appearance, and functionality of the project. This includes:

  • Prepare information regarding design, structure specifications, materials, color, equipment, estimated costs, and construction time.
  • Consult with client to determine functional and spatial requirements of structure
  • Direct activities of workers engaged in preparing drawings and specification documents
  • Plan layout of project.
  • Prepare contract documents for building contractors.
  • Prepare shop drawings

name: Project Manager
description:
At Yamen, the maintenance department shall:

  • Conduct proper maintenance, renovations, repairs, and checkups on everything between hands especially that of machineries and equipment.
  • Completes daily, weekly and monthly checklists and other related templates of machineries and equipment to maintain records of scheduled maintenance procedures.
  • Any machinery, equipment, and/or appliance purchased shall be signed by the Maintenance Supervisor to ensure compatibility with the facility and required services.
  • Regular tracking and checkups on inventory parts and requirements.
  • May obtain estimates for supplies, repair parts; orders parts as needed
